Faq.a1: Backcom.exchange is a service designed for traders to reclaim the fees they've paid to cryptocurrency exchanges. Our platform helps you recover these fees and enhances your trading profitability.
Faq.a2: We integrate with your trading accounts on various exchanges, track the fees you've paid, and then return those fees directly to you.
Faq.a3: Backcom.exchange supports a wide range of popular cryptocurrency exchanges. Check our features page for a full list.

Work.how-it-work-explaind: Simply use or switch to our referral code, and your trading fees will be refunded daily.
